Plot: A Pittsburgh woman with two jobs as a welder and an exotic dancer wants to get into ballet school.
Title: Flashdance
Writer: Thomas Hedley Jr. (screenplay), Joe Eszterhas (screenplay), Thomas Hedley Jr. (story)
Actors: Jennifer Beals, Michael Nouri, Lilia Skala, Sunny Johnson
tomatoConsensus: All style and very little substance, Flashdance boasts eye-catching dance sequences -- and benefits from an appealing performance from Jennifer Beals -- but its narrative is flat-footed.
